2018740.name: MetaDOS
2018740.description:
Greeting Timeseekers! Let’s gather to dive into a massive Battle Royale using the Time-as-currency concept. Enjoy faster and more intense battles with the concept of Time.


MetaDOS is a Battle Royale where you play as legendary characters (Known as The Hunters) with powerful abilities team up to battle in a Tournament with various skills and compete to become the last man or last squad standing.

MEET THE NEW HUNTERS AND FACE THEIR ABILITIES

Choose your Hunter, each with their own unique personality, strengths, and abilities that are easy to pick up but challenging to truly master. The game also offers a range of features to enhance your gaming experience, from immersive graphics and effects to intuitive controls and seamless gameplay.

YOUR TIME, YOUR LIFE

Every second counts. All Hunters need to constantly earn, manage, and protect your remaining seconds. Survive by taking down other Hunters and looting Time Capsule and Supply Box across the island.

The longer you last, the greater your rewards.

EXCLUSIVE SKIN AND COSMETICS

Elevate your loadout and customization with weapon and hunter exclusive skins, and more standout cosmetics.

LOCKED & LOADED

The game offers a diverse selection of weapons, each with unique attributes including damage, range, accuracy, and rate of fire, as well as different fire modes. 

These weapons are classified into categories, find the best gun and its attachments to make the best firearm that suits your playstyle.

IMMERSIVE MAP AND TIME FEATURES

Battle across Dayton, a 2.1x2.23 km island featuring 18 unique locations, each with signature landmarks, vertical combat zones, and time-based environmental challenges.

From industrial outposts to futuristic labs, every area has strategic depth and a story to uncover.

The MetaDOS journey begins now. Play the Open Beta, test your survival instincts, and help shape the future of this time-bending battle royale.
2018740.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
